definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Would you tell me where the Chinas restaurant is ?
sentences.chinese: 请你告诉我中餐厅局级在哪里？

sentences.english: Officials below the level of deputy bureau chief cannot use official trips for business trips.
sentences.chinese: 副局级以下官员不能将公务出差作为商业旅行。

sentences.english: Subsequently, conference Party committee organizes all bureau class cadre to learn conference spirit again.
sentences.chinese: 随后，会党委又组织全体局级干部学习会议精神。

sentences.english: Officials below the level of deputy bureau chief cannot use official cars for business trips.
sentences.chinese: 副局级以下官员不能将公务出差作为商业旅行。

definition: main job/day job/steady full-time job (as opposed to temporary or casual)/chief or principal post (as opposed to deputy)
working hand/member of a work team/participant/(short form of 第一把手[di4 yi1 ba3 shou3]) the boss
temporary assignment to a Chinese government or CCP post
administrative unit (e.g. province 省[sheng3], prefecture 地區|地区[di4 qu1] or county 縣|县[xian4])
Organization Department/abbr. for 中共中央組織部|中共中央组织部[Zhong1 Gong4 Zhong1 yang1 Zu3 zhi1 bu4]
to be put in charge of/to be responsible for/branched passage
Central Commission for Discipline Inspection (CCDI), organization within the CCP which investigates corruption and other wrongdoing among Party cadres/abbr. for 中共中央紀律檢查委員會|中共中央纪律检查委员会
